column4: hiya. Anyone know how to list the files installed from X package ?
sudo apt-get install apt-file, then sudo apt-file update, then sudo apt-file show X package
just goes to the next line.
its from a .deb not on the mirrors tho
how do you use dpkg to list the files from it ?
i have never figured this out :(
i know if i still have the .deb i can dpkg -c file.deb
but if i DONT have the deb..
I was getting mixed up with the capital L, I was trying to do it on mine but with lowercase l and was obviously having problems
